chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> preDTA_ref_ok (predta_kill_non_coacc d a)

Premises:
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
predta_kill_non_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => non_coacc_kill d (predta_coacc_states d a) : preDTA -> ad -> preDTA
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
predta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (sigma : signature), preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (predta_kill_non_coacc d a) sigma
predta_kill_non_coacc_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc (predta_kill_non_coacc d a0) a0 a1
predta_kill_non_coacc_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (s : state), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a0 = Some s /\ coacc d a a0 < -> MapGet state (predta_kill_non_coacc d a) a0 = Some s
predta_coacc_0_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states_0 d a) a0 = Some true < -> coacc d a a0
predta_coacc_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states d a) a0 = Some true < -> coacc d a a0
rec_nonco_kill : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a0 t -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance_co (predta_kill_non_coacc d a0) a a0 t
predta_kill_non_coacc_def_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => preDTA_ref_ok d -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc (predta_kill_non_coacc d a0) a0 a1 : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
rec_co_def_3 = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance_co d a a t : term -> Prop
rec_co_9 : forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), liste_reconnait d l tl -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance_co d0 a0 a0 u) -> (forall b : ad, prec_occur l b -> coacc d a b) -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> liste_reconnait_co d l a tl
rec_co : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance_co d a a t
predta_kill_non_coacc_dir : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (non_coacc_kill d (predta_coacc_states d a)) a t
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true
rec_co_def_4 = fun (d : preDTA) (l : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall a : ad, preDTA_ref_ok d -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance_co d0 a0 a0 u) -> (forall b : ad, prec_occur l b -> coacc d a b) -> liste_reconnait_co d l a tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
predta_coacc_fix_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), lower_fix_point bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) (predta_coacc d a) (predta_coacc_states d a)
predta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check d = true -> preDTA_ref_ok d
predta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_ref_ok_check d = true
predta_coacc_increasing : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), increasing_app bool (lemd d) (predta_coacc d a)
predta_coacc_fix_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states d a) a0 = Some true -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) n) a0 = Some true
predta_coacc_reverse : forall (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (a b : ad), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) n) b = Some true -> coacc d a b
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
dta_kill_non_coacc = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => dta (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a end : DTA -> DTA
coacc_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> P d a a) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a2) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), coacc p a a0 -> P p a a0
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
predta_coacc_fix_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (n : nat), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) n) a0 = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states d a) a0 = Some true
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad) (m : Map bool), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> ensemble_base state d m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc d a0 m) b = Some true
coacc_transitive : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad), coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a1 a2 -> coacc d a0 a2
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
pl_coacc_contain_coacc_ads : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> prec_list_ref_ok p d -> MapGet bool (pl_coacc d p) a = Some true
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d

```coq
intros d a.
apply predta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign with d a.
assumption.
apply predta_ref_ok_check_complete.
rewrite predta_ref_ok_check_correct.
apply predta_ref_ok_def.
apply predta_kill_non_coacc_0.
Qed.```

original: intros d a. apply predta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign with d a. auto. apply predta_ref_ok_check_complete. rewrite predta_ref_ok_check_correct. apply predta_ref_ok_def. apply predta_kill_non_coacc_0.
